ingredients: 1 (5.3 ounce) container low-fat vanilla Greek yogurt,   +   1/2 cup chopped kiwi, 2 tablespoons chopped macadamia nuts, 1 teaspoon agave nectar, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint
nutrition: Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 2g 11%, Cholesterol 9mg 3%, Sodium 74mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 13%, Dietary Fiber 4g 16%, Total Sugars 28g, Protein 15g, Vitamin C 83mg 413%, Calcium 46mg 4%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 339mg 7%
